author: By Emily Chan For Mailonline
description: It's flopped at the box office so far. And plans for further sequels to Guy Ritchie'sÂ King Arthur: Legend of the Sword are now 'dead', sources say. The epic was released in the US on Friday.
title: Plans for King Arthur franchise are 'dead'

description: The last reboot of King Arthur courted controversy for digitally enhancing the breasts of its female lead, Keira Knightley, on the official poster.
title: The fall of Camelot: how Guy Ritchie's King Arthur became a $175 million box office bomb
